segments.text: Ah , Michelle , hi . I was hoping to see you . How have you been ? How's the family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hello , Mr . Campbell . I'm fine and Jack's doing well . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm fine thanks . I got your report this morning . Thank's for that . Are you joining the conference today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm leaving at four pm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , well we can discuss this more then , but I think the figures are looking very good for this quarter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm planning to discuss the advertising budget at the conference . I don't think we should continue with the TV advertising .
segments.speaker: S1
